entryTitle: Unlimited movies, TV shows, and more
callToAction: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.
enjoyOnYourTVDescription: Watch on Smart TVs, Playstation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players, and more.
downloadYourShows: Download your shows to watch offline
downloadYourShowsDescription: Save your favorites easily and always have something to watch.
watchEverywhereDescription: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop, and TV.
createProfilesForKidsDescription: Send kids on adventures with their favorite characters in a space made just for them - free with your membership.
whatCanIWatchOnNetflix: What can I watch on Netflix?
